<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// check whether a function is hot or cold.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
